name: Forward Level
description:
FORWARD LEVEL

Forward Level is a game for touchscreen devices only.

Forward Level is a nice and fun platform game. Minimum display resolution required is 900 x 600. (Widescreen game)

The game is based on a new planet. The yellow coloured platform gets destroyed after 8 seconds and the player must wait for it to be created again.

Instructions-

After selecting NEW GAME touch the top left side of the screen to place button A. After button A is placed touch the top right side of the screen to place button B. The buttons are placed according to the positions of the touch. Placing the buttons helps in making the game comfortable to play.

Press button A to make the player run and press button A again to make the player stop. Press button B to make the player jump. Jump while running. Finish the level in shortest time possible. The time will start when button A is pressed first time to make the player run after button A and button B are placed. The shortest time will be saved and can be seen from the BEST TIME option.
